description: Monitor for newly executed processes (such as mstsc.exe) that may use [Valid Accounts](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1078) to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions that spawn additional processes as the logged-on user. Analytic 1 - Unusual processes associated with RDP sessions sourcetype=WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational EventCode=1 | search (parent_process="mstsc.exe" OR parent_process="rdpclip.exe") | table _time, host, user, process_name, parent_process, command_line | where process_name!="expected_processes"
